scripts.deploy: bash ./scripts/check-prerequisites.sh -vv && bash ./scripts/srv-dev-clean.sh -vv && bash ./scripts/srv-dev-bootstrap.sh -vv && docker compose up --build -d
scripts.purge: docker compose down -v; bash ./scripts/srv-dev-clean.sh -vv --purge; docker system prune -a --volumes
scripts.reset: npm run purge; bash ./scripts/srv-dev-bootstrap.sh -vv && docker compose up --build -d
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run clean; bash ./scripts/srv-dev-bootstrap.sh -vv && docker compose up --build
scripts.sync-modules: git submodule foreach --recursive 'branch=$(git config -f $toplevel/.gitmodules submodule.$name.branch || echo master); echo Switching $name to branch $branch; git checkout $branch || git checkout -b $branch origin/$branch; git pull origin $branch'
scripts.sync: git pull --recurse-submodules && git submodule update --remote --recursive && npm run sync-modules
scripts.restart-api: cd services/avenirs-portfolio/avenirs-portfolio-api && mvn spotless:apply && npm run deploy && docker logs --follow avenirs-portfolio-api
scripts.reset-db: npm run clean-db && npm run init-db
